name: @freebreaker/selfhosted-supabase
description: Control your self-hosted Supabase from your development environment. Browse schemas, run SQL, manage migrations and auth users, inspect stats, and work with storage and realtime. Generate TypeScript types to keep your code in sync.

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: Lists all accessible tables in the connected database, grouped by schema.

tools.name: list_extensions
tools.description: Lists all installed PostgreSQL extensions in the database.

tools.name: list_migrations
tools.description: Lists applied database migrations recorded in supabase_migrations.schema_migrations table.

tools.name: apply_migration
tools.description: Applies a SQL migration script and records it in the supabase_migrations.schema_migrations table within a transaction.

sql.description: The SQL DDL content of the migration.

name.description: An optional descriptive name for the migration.

tools.name: execute_sql
tools.description: Executes an arbitrary SQL query against the database, using direct database connection when available or RPC function as fallback.

read_only.description: Hint for the RPC function whether the query is read-only (best effort).

tools.name: get_database_connections
tools.description: Retrieves information about active database connections from pg_stat_activity.

tools.name: get_database_stats
tools.description: Retrieves statistics about database activity and the background writer from pg_stat_database and pg_stat_bgwriter.

tools.name: get_project_url
tools.description: Returns the configured Supabase project URL for this server.

tools.name: get_anon_key
tools.description: Returns the configured Supabase anon key for this server.

tools.name: get_service_key
tools.description: Returns the configured Supabase service role key for this server, if available.

tools.name: generate_typescript_types
tools.description: Generates TypeScript types from the database schema using the Supabase CLI (`supabase gen types`) and downloads the file to the specified absolute path. The tool returns the current platform (win32, darwin, linux) to help with path formatting. Requires DATABASE_URL configuration and Supabase CLI installed.

output_path.description: Absolute path where to download the generated TypeScript file. Examples: Windows: "C:\\path\\to\\project\\database.types.ts", macOS/Linux: "/path/to/project/database.types.ts". This parameter is required.

output_filename.description: Filename to save the generated types to in the workspace root.

included_schemas.description: Database schemas to include in type generation.

tools.name: rebuild_hooks
tools.description: Attempts to restart the pg_net worker. Requires the pg_net extension to be installed and available.

tools.name: verify_jwt_secret
tools.description: Checks if the Supabase JWT secret is configured for this server and returns a preview.

tools.name: list_auth_users
tools.description: Lists users from the auth.users table.

limit.description: Max number of users to return

tools.name: get_auth_user
tools.description: Retrieves details for a specific user from auth.users by their ID.

user_id.description: The UUID of the user to retrieve.

tools.name: delete_auth_user
tools.description: Deletes a user from auth.users by their ID. Requires service_role key and direct DB connection.

user_id.description: The UUID of the user to delete.

tools.name: create_auth_user
tools.description: Creates a new user directly in auth.users. WARNING: Requires plain password, insecure. Use with extreme caution.

email.description: The email address for the new user.

password.description: Plain text password (min 6 chars). WARNING: Insecure.

tools.name: update_auth_user
tools.description: Updates fields for a user in auth.users. WARNING: Password handling is insecure. Requires service_role key and direct DB connection.

user_id.description: The UUID of the user to update.

password.description: New plain text password (min 6 chars). WARNING: Insecure.

tools.name: list_storage_buckets
tools.description: Lists all storage buckets in the project.

tools.name: list_storage_objects
tools.description: Lists objects within a specific storage bucket, optionally filtering by prefix.

limit.description: Max number of objects to return

prefix.description: Filter objects by a path prefix (e.g., 'public/')

bucket_id.description: The ID of the bucket to list objects from.

tools.name: list_realtime_publications
tools.description: Lists PostgreSQL publications, often used by Supabase Realtime.
